promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive simple bear fighting-type pokemon wearing dark bracers. It can be found in ruins-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or bear. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Ruinursa, a a massive simple bear fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in ruins-like environments It has the following abilities: Gathering Footsteps, Call for Friend. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bear", "fighting" or "Ruinursa". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, bear-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Dwelling in ancient structures, the colossal Ruinursa utilizes Gathering Footsteps to detect foes and Call for Friend to summon allies in battle.
